Headline: Temporary #151 Sheridan Northbound Reroute near Washington between LaSalle-Clark
ShortDescription: 151 Sheridan Northbound buses are temporarily rerouted due to street blockage near Washington between LaSalle-Clark.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#151 Sheridan Northbound buses are temporarily rerouted via Dearborn, Monroe, State, Washington and resume normal route due to street blockage near Washington between LaSalle-Clark.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #88 Higgins Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Harlem/Palestine
ShortDescription: EB 88 Higgins buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Devon, Northwest Highway and Harlem, due to street blockage near Harlem/Palestine

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #88 Higgins buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Devon, Northwest Highway and Harlem, due to street blockage near Harlem/Palestine

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #112 Vincennes/111th Temporary Reroute at 111th/Western
ShortDescription: 112 Vincennes/111th buses are temporarily rerouted via 111th, Western, 115th, Kedzie and 111th, due to street blockage near 111th/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#112 Vincennes/111th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 111th, Western, 115th, Kedzie and 111th, due to street blockage near 111th/Western.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at North/Clybourn. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at North/Clybourn.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
